name: Wordom Hidden Words
description:
"ESCAPE from boredom and stimulate your mind"
"TRAIN your vocabulary and become a word master"

FREE & MOST ADDICTIVE Hidden Words game that will test your vocab! with WORDOM Hidden Words Games.

### HOW TO PLAY ###
Find and swipe words to solve these fun and increasingly challenging puzzles. You’ll enjoy a fun challenge as you identify the hidden words associated with UNIQUE game mode!
Cheer!! :)
